item.title: Hello world!
item.description: For my first post here I have decided to put my little game created for pico-8 fantasy console. I also have a personal page on itch.io (with not so much to see on it)

item.title: About
item.description: chartexample.com - my personal blog where I implement different types of charts by using set of javascript (and sometimes other) libraries. You can find information about me on my LinkedIn page Feel free to contact me by E-Mail - hello@alexchirkin.me If you find some error or want to contribute to this project - GitHub.

item.title: D3
item.description: function makeBar() { //empty data set let data = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0] // max data item value const max = 10 // min data item value const min = 0 const paddingY = 25 const paddingX = 50 // selecting root element for plot const svg = d3.select('#chart') // getting root element width const width = parseInt(svg.

item.title: D3
